comment._content: Hello dear friend, My name is Faith ,i saw your profile today and became intrested in you,i will also like to know you the more,and i want you to send an email to my email address so i can give you my picture for you to know whom i am.Here is my email address( faith.harry@ymail.com ) l believe we can move from here I am waiting.Please i want you to send me your e-mail to my own e-mail box so that i will send you my picture and you will know who i am Faith.(Remeber the distance or colour does not matter but love matters alot in life) Thanks Faith,faith.harry@ymail.com
